title._content: [Portrait of John Hardee, Famous Door, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of John Hardee, Famous Door, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 398 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Hardee, John, 1918- Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Saxophonists--1940-1950. Double bassists--1940-1950. Drummers (Musicians)--1940-1950. Fifty-second Street (New York, N.Y.)--1940-1950. Famous Door Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
